head.title: Fans Can Buy Tiles And Help Children

hedline.hl1: Fans Can Buy Tiles And Help Children

block.p: James Dolan, Cablevision's president and chief executive, and Dave Checketts, Madison Square Garden's president and chief executive, held a news conference yesterday to unveil the Garden's Solid Ground Program. The effort benefits the Garden's Cherring for Children Foundation, which introduced a city-wide after-school initiative.

James Dolan, Cablevision's president and chief executive, and Dave Checketts, Madison Square Garden's president and chief executive, held a news conference yesterday to unveil the Garden's Solid Ground Program. The effort benefits the Garden's Cherring for Children Foundation, which introduced a city-wide after-school initiative.
Through the Solid Ground Program, fans can purchase personalized tiles for the front landing of the Garden.
Brian Leetch, Patrick Ewing, Larry Johnson, Teresa Weatherspoon, Rebecca Lobo, Walt Frazier, Rod Gilbert and Mary Albert also took part in the ceremony. PLUS: CHARITY
